trans-unit.source: Specifies the editing mode for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 편집 모드를 지정 된<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> properties use the InkCanvasEditingMode to specify how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> behaves when it receives input from a tablet pen.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A>속성은 InkCanvasEditingMode를 사용 하 여 지정 방법을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>태블릿 펜에서 입력을 받을 때 작동 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the pen erases part of a stroke when the pen intersects the stroke.
trans-unit.target: 펜 펜 스트로크와 때 stroke의 일부를 지웁니다 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the pen erases an entire stroke when the pen intersects the stroke.
trans-unit.target: 펜 스트로크와 될 때 전체 획 지워지도록 지정는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref> responds to gestures, and does not receive ink.
trans-unit.target: 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref> 제스처에 응답 하 고 잉크를 수신 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that ink appears on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref> when the pen sends data to it.
trans-unit.target: 에 나타나는 잉크 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref> 펜 데이터를 보낼 때.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref> responds to gestures, and receives ink.
trans-unit.target: 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref> 제스처에 응답 하 고 잉크 받습니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that no action is taken when the pen sends data to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 아무 작업도 수행 펜 데이터를 보낼 때 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the pen selects strokes and elements on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 펜 스트로크 및 요소에서 선택 한다고 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>합니다.
